privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: LLP "World Trade" (NeuroBoost) (hereinafter - Company) in accordance with the requirements of the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan "On Personal Data and Their Protection".

general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.content: This Privacy Policy defines the procedure for processing personal data and measures to ensure the security of personal data taken by NeuroBoost (hereinafter - Company) in accordance with the requirements of the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan "On Personal Data and Their Protection".

purposes.title: 2. Purposes of Personal Data Processing
purposes.intro: The Company processes personal data for the following purposes:
items: Providing AI solution implementation services
Client consulting
Fulfillment of contractual obligations
Technical support
Informing about new services and products
Conducting marketing research

dataTypes.title: 3. Types of Processed Personal Data
dataTypes.intro: The Company may process the following personal data:
items: Last name, first name, patronymic
Contact data (phone, email, address)
Company and position information
Website and service usage data
Other data voluntarily provided by the subject

processingMethods.title: 4. Methods of Personal Data Processing
processingMethods.content: The Company processes personal data both using automation tools and without them. Processing includes collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification, extraction, use, transfer, depersonalization, blocking, deletion and destruction of personal data.

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: The legal basis for processing personal data includes:
items: Consent of the personal data subject
Necessity for contract performance
Necessity for compliance with legal obligations
Protection of vital interests of the subject

retentionPeriod.title: 6. Personal Data Processing Periods
retentionPeriod.content: Personal data is processed for the period necessary to achieve processing purposes, unless a different period is provided by contract or legislation. Upon expiration of the processing period, personal data is subject to destruction or depersonalization.

thirdPartyTransfer.title: 7. Transfer of Personal Data to Third Parties
thirdPartyTransfer.content: The Company does not transfer personal data to third parties, except in cases provided by legislation or with the consent of the personal data subject. Transfer may be carried out to contractors and partners for fulfillment of contractual obligations.

securityMeasures.title: 8. Personal Data Protection Measures
securityMeasures.intro: The Company takes necessary technical and organizational measures to protect personal data:
items: Data encryption during transmission and storage
Access control to personal data
Regular security system updates
Staff training on data protection issues
Data backup and recovery

dataSubjectRights.title: 9. Personal Data Subject Rights
dataSubjectRights.intro: The personal data subject has the right to:
items: Receive information about processing of their personal data
Require clarification, blocking or destruction of personal data
Withdraw consent for personal data processing
File complaints with the authorized body
Protect their rights in court

cookies.title: 10. Use of Cookies
cookies.content: The website uses cookies to improve user experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. You can disable cookies in browser settings, however this may limit website functionality.

policyChanges.title: 11. Privacy Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: The Company reserves the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. The current version is posted on the website with the date of last update.

contactInfo.title: 12. Contact Information
contactInfo.intro: For questions about personal data processing, contact:
contactInfo.address: Address: Kazakhstan, Almaty, Turksib district, Dulatova str. 53, 050003

publicOffer.title: Public Offer
publicOffer.intro: This public offer defines the terms of service provision by LLP "World Trade" (NeuroBoost).

general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.content: This public offer (hereinafter - Offer) defines the terms of providing AI solution implementation, consulting and technical support services provided by LLP "World Trade" (NeuroBoost) (hereinafter - Contractor).

items.offer: Offer - this document posted on the Contractor's website
items.acceptance: Acceptance - full and unconditional acceptance of the Offer terms
items.services: Services - a set of works on AI solution implementation, consulting and technical support
items.client: Customer - an individual or legal entity that has accepted the Offer terms

subject.title: 3. Subject of the Agreement
subject.content: The Contractor undertakes to provide the Customer with AI solution implementation, consulting and technical support services, and the Customer undertakes to accept and pay for the specified services in accordance with the terms of this Offer.

rightsObligations.title: 4. Rights and Obligations of the Parties

executorRights.title: 4.1. Contractor Rights:
items: Require the Customer to provide necessary information
Suspend service provision in case of payment terms violation
Make changes to technical specifications in agreement with the Customer

executorObligations.title: 4.2. Contractor Obligations:
items: Provide services in full and within established timeframes
Ensure confidentiality of Customer information
Provide technical support within the contract framework

clientRights.title: 4.3. Customer Rights:
items: Require quality service provision
Receive consultations on AI solution usage
Require confidentiality compliance

clientObligations.title: 4.4. Customer Obligations:
items: Pay for services on time
Provide necessary information and documents
Comply with terms of use of provided solutions

payment.title: 5. Payment Procedure
payment.content: Service costs are determined in accordance with the current price list. Payment is made in the national currency of the Republic of Kazakhstan (tenge) in the manner provided by the contract. VAT is not subject to taxation in accordance with current legislation.

liability.title: 6. Liability of the Parties
liability.content: The parties are liable for non-performance or improper performance of their obligations in accordance with the current legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan. The Contractor is not liable for damage caused as a result of third party actions or force majeure circumstances.

confidentiality.title: 7. Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: The parties undertake not to disclose confidential information received during contract performance. Confidentiality obligations are valid for 5 years after the contract expiration date.

disputeResolution.title: 8. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: All disputes and disagreements are resolved through negotiations. If agreement cannot be reached, disputes are subject to consideration in court at the Contractor's location.

finalProvisions.title: 9. Final Provisions
finalProvisions.content: This Offer comes into force from the moment of its posting on the website and is valid until withdrawal. The Contractor has the right to unilaterally change the Offer terms with 10 days' notice to the Customer before changes take effect.

consent.title: Consent to Personal Data Processing
consent.intro: In accordance with the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan 'On Personal Data and Their Protection', I, as a personal data subject, freely, by my will and in my interest, give my consent to Limited Liability Partnership 'World Trade' (BIN: 240740019557, address: Republic of Kazakhstan, Almaty, Turksib District, Dulatova St. 53, 050003) to process my personal data provided when using the NeuroBoost service, as well as when interacting with the website, chatbots and other company services.

dataProcessing.title: 1. Personal Data Processing
dataProcessing.content: Personal data processing means any actions (operations) performed using automation tools or without them, including: collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (updating, modification), retrieval, use, transfer (dissemination, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction.

purposes.title: 2. Processing Purposes
purposes.content: The purposes of processing personal data are: providing access to NeuroBoost platform services and functionality; concluding and fulfilling contracts; providing consulting, information and other services; improving service quality and personalizing the provided services; fulfilling the requirements of the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

dataTypes.title: 3. Types of Personal Data
dataTypes.content: The following personal data may be processed: last name, first name, patronymic (if any); contact details (phone number, email address); information provided by the user during registration or use of the service; other data voluntarily provided by the personal data subject.

consentWithdrawal.title: 4. Consent Withdrawal
consentWithdrawal.content: Consent may be withdrawn by sending a written notice to the company's address: 050003, Republic of Kazakhstan, Almaty, Turksib District, Dulatova St. 53, LLP 'World Trade'.

dataRetention.title: 5. Term of Consent
dataRetention.content: The consent is valid from the moment it is provided and until it is withdrawn by the personal data subject.

functionality.title: 3. Bot Functionality
functionality.content: The Bot provides the following capabilities: AI solution consulting, service cost calculation, tariff information, technical support, notifications about new services.

userObligations.title: 4. User Obligations

Do not share other users' personal data with third parties
Do not use the Bot for illegal purposes
Maintain confidentiality of received information

liability.title: 5. Liability

dataProcessing.title: 6. Data Processing
dataProcessing.content: By using the Bot, you agree to the processing of your personal data in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

changes.title: 7. Agreement Changes
changes.content: The Bot administration has the right to unilaterally change this Agreement terms. Changes take effect from the moment of their publication in the Bot.

contactInfo.title: 8. Contact Information
contactInfo.content: For all questions related to Bot use, contact: galuza_nikita@mail.ru
